description:
Dreams of memes...

Bonus AR Experience:  
Open this Adobe Aero link (https://adobeaero.app.link/ucjTojwqiwb) on your smartphone and tap "Open App Clip." Adobe Aero will launch as an instant app. Tap "Continue" and once the meme card image loads, point your phone camera to an image of the card on your computer or another screen. Enjoy the AR experience!

Meme: 1  
Season: 2  
Card: 1
